esiot.exp_name: Interfacing Arduino with Pot and Servo motor
Interfacing Digital sensor PIR with Arduino
Interfacing Motor Using Relay with Raspberry Pi/ Arduino Based on Temperature
esiot.code:
import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
import Adafruit_DHT
import time
DHT_SENSOR = Adafruit_DHT.DHT11
DHT_PIN = 4
RELAY_PIN = 17
GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
GPIO.setup(RELAY_PIN, GPIO.OUT)
GPIO.output(RELAY_PIN, GPIO.LOW)
TEMP_THRESHOLD = 30.0
print("Temperature-based Motor Control System Started")
try:
 while True:
 humidity, temperature = Adafruit_DHT.read_retry(DHT_SENSOR, DHT_PIN)

 if temperature is not None:
 print(f"Temperature: {temperature:.1f}°C | Humidity: {humidity:.1f}%")
 if temperature > TEMP_THRESHOLD:
 GPIO.output(RELAY_PIN, GPIO.HIGH)
 print("Temperature high! Motor ON.")
 else:
 GPIO.output(RELAY_PIN, GPIO.LOW)
 print("Temperature normal. Motor OFF.")
 else:
 print("Sensor read error!")
 time.sleep(2)
except KeyboardInterrupt:
 print("Program stopped by user.")
finally:
 GPIO.output(RELAY_PIN, GPIO.LOW)
 GPIO.cleanup()

esiot.exp_name: Interfacing LCD with Raspberry Pi to Display Temperature and Humidity
esiot.code:
import Adafruit_DHT
import I2C_LCD_driver
import time
DHT_SENSOR = Adafruit_DHT.DHT11
DHT_PIN = 4
lcd = I2C_LCD_driver.lcd()
try:
 while True:
 humidity, temperature = Adafruit_DHT.read_retry(DHT_SENSOR, DHT_PIN)
 if humidity is not None and temperature is not None:
 lcd.lcd_display_string(f"Temp: {temperature:.1f}C", 1)
 lcd.lcd_display_string(f"Humidity: {humidity:.1f}%", 2)
 else:
 lcd.lcd_display_string("Sensor Error", 1)
 time.sleep(2)
except KeyboardInterrupt:
 lcd.lcd_clear()
 print("Program stopped.")
